item.title: How Tenant Restrictions v2 Can be Used to Prevent Data Exfiltration
item.description:
In a previous blog, we introduced Continuous Access Evaluation (CAE) - a product that brings Zero Trust principles to session management. Today we would like to discuss securing cross-tenant access with a focus on preventing data exfiltration.
It’s impossible to imagine a successful modern organization that doesn’t collaborate with partners across organizational boundaries. While cross-company collaboration empowers employees and enables partnerships, it also lowers barriers for both accidental and malicious data exfiltration.
